meanings.definition: A person who derives sexual gratification from their own pain or humiliation.
meanings.sent1: Some masochists enjoy feeling pain during intimate moments.
meanings.sent2: Many masochists find pleasure in experiencing pain during sexual activities.
meanings.sent3: The masochists at the party laughed when they accidentally bumped into each other.
meanings.sent4: Her love for spicy food made her a masochist in the eyes of her friends.
meanings.sent5: The image of the masochists smiling while enduring pain stuck in his mind.

meanings.definition: A person who enjoys an activity that appears to be painful or tedious.
meanings.sent1: Some masochists like to challenge themselves with difficult puzzles.
meanings.sent2: The masochists in the group willingly took on the most boring tasks.
meanings.sent3: The masochists in the book club volunteered to read the longest and most boring novel.
meanings.sent4: Being a masochist for punishment, he chose to clean the entire house by himself.
meanings.sent5: The masochists in the marathon smiled as they pushed through the pain to reach the finish line.
